title: Jimbaran Beach Relaxation (Half-day)
overview: Experience the calm waters and famous seafood dining of Jimbaran Beach.

stops.description: Arrive and relax on the sand or swim in the bay.
Enjoy a seafood lunch on the sand.

title: Jimbaran Beach & Sunset Dinner (Full-day)
overview: Spend a full day at Jimbaran Beach, with swimming, seafood, and a sunset dinner.

stops.description: Swim and sunbathe on the soft sand.
Visit the local fish market and sample fresh catches.
Relax at a café or take a stroll along the bay.
Enjoy a sunset seafood dinner on the sand.
